name: Rinkitink in Oz
summary: Prince Inga of Pingaree and King Rinkitink and their companions have adventures that lead to the land of the Nomes and, eventually, Oz. Baum originally wrote this book as a non-Oz book entitled King Rinkitink.
info:
• 中文名: 奥兹国的林奇汀奇国王
  • 作者: Lyman Frank Baum
  • 别名: オズのリンキティンク
  • 别名: 林基汀克
  • 出版社: Reilly & Britton
  • 发售日: 1916年
  • 插画: John R. Neill
